    Installation

    TermIt can be easily setup through Docker Compose, setting up all necessary services and dependencies. Details are described here.

    An alternative (more complicated) is to install and wire up the services independently. Follow individual installation instructions for setting up each service:

    • TermIt
    • TermIt Server
